meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of locusts.
meanings.sent1: The locustal swarm darkened the sky.
meanings.sent2: The locustal invasion devastated the crops.
meanings.sent3: The locustal picnic guests ate everything in sight!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a locustal buzz in the room.
meanings.sent5: The locustal nature of their behavior was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: Resembling or having the qualities of a locust.
meanings.sent1: His locustal appetite for sweets was insatiable.
meanings.sent2: The locustal eyes of the painting seemed to follow you.
meanings.sent3: The locustal speed at which he finished his homework amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a locustal quality, piercing and persistent.
meanings.sent5: The locustal swarm of thoughts clouded his mind.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the behavior or habits of locusts.
meanings.sent1: The locustal instinct to migrate kicked in.
meanings.sent2: The locustal frenzy took over the field.
meanings.sent3: The locustal dance party was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: His locustal persistence paid off in the end.
meanings.sent5: The locustal swarm moved as one, a force of nature.
